content.summary: A motivated Human Resources graduate with strong organizational skills, interpersonal abilities, and a passion for fostering positive work environments. Proficient in recruitment processes, employee onboarding, and maintaining HR records.

experience.title: HR Recruiter
responsibilities: Partnered with hiring managers to determine staffing needs.
Sourced candidates using various job portals.
Conducted employee onboarding and orientation sessions.
Assisted in maintaining HR records and documentation.

experience.title: Marketing / HR Intern
responsibilities: Identified, developed, and evaluated marketing strategies.
Communicated clearly and professionally with staff and customers.] },

responsibilities.title: Customer Service Representative
responsibilities: Addressed customer service enquiries quickly and accurately.
Assisted customers with product related questions, feedback, and complaints.
Processed and issued product orders and service upgrades for customers.

projects.title: Work Life balance of women working in Education sector (with reference to Indore)
projects.objectives: Understood the need for work-life balance, studied the difficulties faced by working women, and proposed ways to maintain work-life balance.

certifications.name: Industry Readiness Program on Banking and Insurance by NSE ACADEMY
Microsoft Excel â€“ Beginner to Advance from UDEMY

candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Identified and developed marketing strategies, conducted a project on work-life balance.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Partnered with hiring managers, conducted employee orientation sessions.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Communicated clearly and professionally with staff and customers.
